thread.title: BRIEF-Autocanada Enters Credit Agreement Providing Credit Facilities of Up To $1.08 Bln

title: BRIEF-Autocanada Enters Credit Agreement Providing Credit Facilities of Up To $1.08 Bln

organizations.name: brief-autocanada enters credit agreement providing credit facilities

text: March 20, 2018 / 10:40 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Autocanada Enters Credit Agreement Providing Credit Facilities of Up To $1.08 Bln Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Autocanada Inc: * AUTOCANADA ANNOUNCES NEW EXPANDED CREDIT FACILITY * ‍ENTERED INTO CREDIT AGREEMENT PROVIDING SECURED CREDIT FACILITIES UP TO $1.08 BILLION * NEW FACILITY REPLACES CO’S EXISTING $550 MILLION SYNDICATED FLOORPLAN FACILITY & $250 MILLION SYNDICATED REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT​ * ‍KEY FINANCIAL COVENANTS ASSOCIATED WITH NEW FACILITY ARE SIMILAR TO EXISTING FACILITIES THAT ARE BEING REPLACED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
